EmailTemplate.name: Registration Required
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Thanks so much for reaching out!
We are happy to get your products registered but regardless, your products are still covered under our warranty. For further details regarding our warranties, please head over to yeti.com/warranty to get all the details.
If you would like to get everything registered, please shoot me over what products you have and we will send some new codes your way.
If we can help with anything else, never hesitate to reach out.
Enjoy your YETI!
{!User.CommunityNickname} The YETI Outfitters 512.394.9384 customerservice@yeti.com yeti.com
